text: Petropavlovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Burunovsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 3 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 35 km from Krasnousolsky, 8 km from Burunovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Petropavlovka, Gafuriysky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
